[Home](./index.md) &gt; [tupelo-wasm-sdk](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.md)

## tupelo-wasm-sdk package

The Tupelo WASM SDK is designed to be used in both nodejs and the browser.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ChainTree](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.chaintree.md) | ChainTree is the main class used for interacting with the data of Tupelo. See [https://docs.quorumcontrol.com/docs/chaintree.html](https://docs.quorumcontrol.com/docs/chaintree.html) for a detailed description of what a ChainTree is. |
|  [Community](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.community.md) | Commmunity is a combination of a Tupelo NotaryGroup and the application 'Community' running. The remote p2p community app will also store blocks, and this is the default supported way that the current wasm-sdk works. |
|  [Dag](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.dag.md) | Underlies a ChainTree, it represents a DAG of IPLD nodes and supports resolving accross multiple nodes. |
|  [EcdsaKey](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ecdsakey.md) | EcdsaKey defines the public/private key-pairs used to interact with Tupelo. It also supportes generating new keys either randomly or through a passphrase. |
|  [Repo](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.repo.md) | Repo is a typescript wrapper around the IPFS Repo [https://github.com/ipfs/js-ipfs-repo](https://github.com/ipfs/js-ipfs-repo) |
|  [WrappedBitswap](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.wrappedbitswap.md) | A wrapper around an IPFS call-back-based bitswap that turns it into async/await compatible. There is currently an open PR on the bitswap repo that will allow us to switch to the IPFS-maintained bitswap completely. |
|  [WrappedBlockService](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.wrappedblockservice.md) | A wrapper around a callback-based IBlockService that allows async/await There is an open PR on the bitswap PR which will allow us to switch to the ipfs-maintained version. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [tomlToNotaryGroup(tomlString)](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.tomltonotarygroup.md) | takes a toml config and returns a NotaryGroup object. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IBitSwap](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ibitswap.md) | An IPFS Bitswap instance. |
|  [IBlock](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.iblock.md) | An IPFS Block |
|  [IBlockService](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.iblockservice.md) | The interface to a js-ipfs block-service. See: [https://ipfs.github.io/js-ipfs-block-service](https://ipfs.github.io/js-ipfs-block-service) |
|  [ICallbackBitswap](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.icallbackbitswap.md) | The callback-based version of Bitswap (current master). |
|  [IChainTreeInitializer](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ichaintreeinitializer.md) | The options to create a new ChainTree. |
|  [IDagStore](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.idagstore.md) | An IPFS DagStore instance |
|  [INodeOptions](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.inodeoptions.md) | Defines the options to create a p2p node |
|  [IP2PNode](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ip2pnode.md) | A instance of a js-libp2p node |
|  [IPubSub](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ipubsub.md) | The interface describing libp2p pubsub |
|  [IPubSubMessage](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ipubsubmessage.md) | Defines the interface used by libp2p for delivering pubsub messages |
|  [IQuery](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.iquery.md) | The interface to an IPFS Query [https://github.com/ipfs/interface-datastore](https://github.com/ipfs/interface-datastore) |
|  [IResolveResponse](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.iresolveresponse.md) | This defines the resolve response when doing queries against the DAG from IPFS |
|  [RepoOpts](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.repoopts.md) | Options used to create a new IPFS repo. [https://github.com/ipfs/js-ipfs-repo](https://github.com/ipfs/js-ipfs-repo) |

## Namespaces

|  Namespace | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [p2p](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.p2p.md) |  |
|  [Tupelo](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.tupelo.md) | Tupelo is the more "raw" namespace, it is generally expected that you would use higher level wrapper classes around this namespace. For example: [EcdsaKey](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ecdsakey.md) or [Community](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.community.md) |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [establishTokenTransaction](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.establishtokentransaction.md) | Returns a new establishTokenTransaction which is used to setup the monetary policy of a new token on a ChainTree |
|  [mintTokenTransaction](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.minttokentransaction.md) |  |
|  [receiveTokenTransaction](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.receivetokentransaction.md) |  |
|  [sendTokenTransaction](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.sendtokentransaction.md) |  |
|  [setDataTransaction](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.setdatatransaction.md) | Returns a setDataTransaction |
|  [setOwnershipTransaction](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.setownershiptransaction.md) | returns a setOwnershipTransaction |
